dataset.title: Amplicon sequencing of Tara Oceans DNA samples corresponding to size fractions for prokaryotes or protist.

address.deliveryPoint: Le Ponant Building D - 25 rue Leblanc
Le Ponant Building D - 25 rue Leblanc

abstract.para: Seawater was filtered from different depths to retain small and large cell sizes (Protists and bacteria Organisms). The DNA was extracted and amplified by PCR.

address.deliveryPoint: Le Ponant Building D - 25 rue Leblanc

samplingDescription.para: Seawater was filtered from different depths to retain small and large cell sizes (Protists and bacteria Organisms). The DNA was extracted and amplified by PCR.

project.title: Amplicon sequencing of Tara Oceans DNA samples corresponding to size fractions for prokaryotes or protist.

bibliography.citation: Tully BJ, Sachdeva R, Graham ED, Heidelberg JF. 2017. 290 metagenome-assembled genomes from the Mediterranean Sea: a resource for marine microbiology. PeerJ vol. 5
